page.original:
A5_FILE_REMOVE() Syntax Result_Flag as L = A5_FILE_REMOVE( Filename as C ) Argument Description Result_Flag .T. = Indicates that the file was deleted. .F. = Indicates that the file was not deleted. Filename The path and name of the file to delete.
Description The A5_FILE_REMOVE() function deletes a file. Examples ? a5_file_remove("C:\Databases\Letterissue\Letterissue.zip") = .T.
See Also File Functions and Methods
